Question: Shenzhen Eastking Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: CES 2024 Exhibition Highlight

- High-speed Portable SSD-Z5 with USB 3.2 Gen2Ã—2 interface, 20Gbps transfer rate, 512GB to 2TB capacity, durable metal casing, and Type-C interface for versatility
- Cool DDR4 RGB- Silver X gaming memory module with up to 3600MHz frequency, capacity up to 32GB, sophisticated silver design, and RGB LED lights
- Upcoming New Release- M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD, a product set to be released soon

KingSpec showcased consumer and industrial-grade storage and memory solutions at CES 2024, including portable SSDs, gaming memory modules, and an upcoming M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 2230 SSD. Established in 2007, KingSpec is a global provider of storage and memory solutions adhering to ISO 9001 quality standards, offering a range of products including SSDs, DDR RAM, memory cards, hub enclosures, USB drives, and storage accessories.
